maqras.text: Ya 'Ayyuha An-Nasu Attaqu Rabbakum 'Inna Zalzalata As-Sa`ati Shay'un `Azimun
Yawma Tarawnaha Tadh/halu Kullu Murđi`atin `Amma 'Arđa`at Wa Tađa`u Kullu Dhati Hamlin Hamlaha Wa Tara An-Nasa Sukara Wa Ma Hum Bisukara Wa Lakinna `Adhaba Allahi Shadidun
Wa Mina An-Nasi Man Yujadilu Fi Allahi Bighayri `Ilmin Wa Yattabi`u Kulla Shaytanin Maridin
Kutiba `Alayhi 'Annahu Man Tawallahu Fa'annahu Yuđilluhu Wa Yahdihi 'Ila `Adhabi As-Sa`iri

Ya 'Ayyuha An-Nasu 'In Kuntum Fi Raybin Mina Al-Ba`thi Fa'inna Khalaqnakum Min Turabin Thumma Min Nutfatin Thumma Min `Alaqatin Thumma Min Muđghatin Mukhallaqatin Wa Ghayri Mukhallaqatin Linubayyina Lakum Wa Nuqirru Fi Al-'Arhami Ma Nasha'u 'Ila 'Ajalin Musammaan Thumma Nukhrijukum Tiflaan Thumma Litablughu 'Ashuddakum Wa Minkum Man Yutawaffa Wa Minkum Man Yuraddu 'Ila 'Ardhali Al-`Umuri Likayla Ya`lama Min Ba`di `Ilmin Shay'aan Wa Tara Al-'Arđa Hamidatan Fa'idha 'Anzalna `Alayha Al-Ma'a Ahtazzat Wa Rabat Wa 'Anbatat Min Kulli Zawjin Bahijin
Dhalika Bi'anna Allaha Huwa Al-Haqqu Wa 'Annahu Yuhyi Al-Mawta Wa 'Annahu `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Wa 'Anna As-Sa`ata 'Atiyatun La Rayba Fiha Wa 'Anna Allaha Yab`athu Man Fi Al-Quburi
Wa Mina An-Nasi Man Yujadilu Fi Allahi Bighayri `Ilmin Wa La Hudaan Wa La Kitabin Munirin
Thaniya `Itfihi Liyuđilla `An Sabili Allahi Lahu Fi Ad-Dunya Khizyun Wa Nudhiquhu Yawma Al-Qiyamati `Adhaba Al-Hariqi
Dhalika Bima Qaddamat Yadaka Wa 'Anna Allaha Laysa Bizallamin Lil`abidi

Wa Mina An-Nasi Man Ya`budu Allaha `Ala Harfin Fa'in 'Asabahu Khayrun Atma'anna Bihi Wa 'In 'Asabat/hu Fitnatun Anqalaba `Ala Wajhihi Khasira Ad-Dunya Wa Al-'Akhirata Dhalika Huwa Al-Khusranu Al-Mubinu
Yad`u Min Duni Allahi Ma La Yađurruhu Wa Ma La Yanfa`uhu Dhalika Huwa Ađ-Đalalu Al-Ba`idu
Yad`u Laman Đarruhu 'Aqrabu Min Naf`ihi Labi'sa Al-Mawla Wa Labi'sa Al-`Ashiru
Inna Allaha Yudkhilu Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu 'Inna Allaha Yaf`alu Ma Yuridu
Man Kana Yazunnu 'An Lan Yansurahu Allahu Fi Ad-Dunya Wa Al-'Akhirati Falyamdud Bisababin 'Ila As-Sama'i Thumma Liyaqta` Falyanzur Hal Yudh/hibanna Kayduhu Ma Yaghizu
Wa Kadhalika 'Anzalnahu 'Ayatin Bayyinatin Wa 'Anna Allaha Yahdi Man Yuridu
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa Al-Ladhina Hadu Wa As-Sabi'ina Wa An-Nasara Wa Al-Majusa Wa Al-Ladhina 'Ashraku 'Inna Allaha Yafsilu Baynahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati 'Inna Allaha `Ala Kulli Shay'in Shahidun

Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha Yasjudu Lahu Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Man Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Ash-Shamsu Wa Al-Qamaru Wa An-Nujumu Wa Al-Jibalu Wa Ash-Shajaru Wa Ad-Dawabbu Wa Kathirun Mina An-Nasi Wa Kathirun Haqqa `Alayhi Al-`Adhabu Wa Man Yuhini Allahu Fama Lahu Min Mukrimin 'Inna Allaha Yaf`alu Ma Yasha'u
